trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event is raised before the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> redirects the request to the identity provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider>事件之前，将引发<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>将请求重定向到标识提供程序。

trans-unit.source: You can access and modify the request through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs.SignInRequestMessage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以访问和修改通过请求<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs.SignInRequestMessage%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can modify the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> property in the sign-in message to change the identity provider to which the request will be redirected.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以修改<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A>登录消息更改请求将重定向到的标识提供程序中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Federation Passive Sign-in message that will be used to redirect the user to the Identity Provider.
trans-unit.target: 将用于重定向这个用户重定向到标识提供程序的 WS-Federation 被动登录消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs" /> class by using the specified WS-Federation Passive Sign-in message.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定WS-Federation “被动登录”消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs.SignInRequestMessage%2A> property in the new instance is initialized to the value of the `signInRequestMessage` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs.SignInRequestMessage%2A>属性中的新实例初始化为的值`signInRequestMessage`参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Federation Passive Sign-in message that will be used to redirect the user to the identity provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于将用户重定向至标识提供程序的 WS-Federation 密钥登录消息。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Federation Sign-in message that will be used to redirect the user to the identity provider.
trans-unit.target: 将用于重定向这个用户重定向到标识提供程序的 WS-Federation 登录消息。

trans-unit.source: You can change properties of the sign-in message to modify the request.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改登录消息，以修改请求的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can modify the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> property in the sign-in message to change the identity provider to which the request will be redirected.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以修改<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A>登录消息更改请求将重定向到的标识提供程序中的属性。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <see langword="null" /> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。
